subject: Football
Interscholastic Athletics
Families and Family Life
Race and Ethnicity
lead_paragraph: Forty years ago, two Louisiana schools tied their state semifinal game, prompting a full replay — a rarity made more unusual by fiercely tempestuous conditions.
